00025 #ifndef __TLM_CORE_IFS_H__
00026 #define __TLM_CORE_IFS_H__
00027 
00028 //#include <systemc>
00029 
00030 #include "tlm_core/tlm_1/tlm_req_rsp/tlm_1_interfaces/tlm_tag.h"
00031 
00032 namespace tlm {
00033 
00034 // bidirectional blocking interfaces
00035 
00036 template < typename REQ , typename RSP >
00037 class tlm_transport_if : public virtual sc_core::sc_interface
00038 {
00039 public:
00040   virtual RSP transport( const REQ & ) = 0;
00041 
00042   virtual void transport( const REQ &req , RSP &rsp ) {
00043     rsp = transport( req );
00044   }
00045 
00046 };
00047 
00048 
00049 // uni-directional blocking interfaces
00050 
00051 template < typename T >
00052 class tlm_blocking_get_if : public virtual sc_core::sc_interface
00053 {
00054 public:
00055   virtual T get( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) = 0;
00056   virtual void get( T &t ) { t = get(); }
00057 
00058 };
00059 
00060 template < typename T >
00061 class tlm_blocking_put_if : public virtual sc_core::sc_interface
00062 {
00063 public:
00064   virtual void put( const T &t ) = 0;
00065 };
00066 
00067 // uni-directional non blocking interfaces
00068 
00069 template < typename T >
00070 class tlm_nonblocking_get_if : public virtual sc_core::sc_interface
00071 {
00072 public:
00073   virtual bool nb_get( T &t ) = 0;
00074   virtual bool nb_can_get( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const = 0;
00075   virtual const sc_core::sc_event &ok_to_get( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const = 0;
00076 };
00077 
00078 template < typename T >
00079 class tlm_nonblocking_put_if : public virtual sc_core::sc_interface
00080 {
00081 public:
00082   virtual bool nb_put( const T &t ) = 0;
00083   virtual bool nb_can_put( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const = 0;
00084   virtual const sc_core::sc_event &ok_to_put( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const = 0;
00085 };
00086 
00087 
00088 // combined uni-directional blocking and non blocking
00089 
00090 template < typename T >
00091 class tlm_get_if :
00092   public virtual tlm_blocking_get_if< T > ,
00093   public virtual tlm_nonblocking_get_if< T > {};
00094 
00095 template < typename T >
00096 class tlm_put_if :
00097   public virtual tlm_blocking_put_if< T > ,
00098   public virtual tlm_nonblocking_put_if< T > {};
00099 
00100 
00101 // peek interfaces
00102 
00103 template < typename T >
00104 class tlm_blocking_peek_if : public virtual sc_core::sc_interface
00105 {
00106 public:
00107   virtual T peek( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const = 0;
00108   virtual void peek( T &t ) const { t = peek(); }
00109 
00110 };
00111 
00112 template < typename T >
00113 class tlm_nonblocking_peek_if : public virtual sc_core::sc_interface
00114 {
00115 public:
00116   virtual bool nb_peek( T &t ) const = 0;
00117   virtual bool nb_can_peek( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const = 0;
00118   virtual const sc_core::sc_event &ok_to_peek( tlm_tag<T> *t = 0 ) const = 0;
00119 };
00120 
00121 template < typename T >
00122 class tlm_peek_if :
00123   public virtual tlm_blocking_peek_if< T > ,
00124   public virtual tlm_nonblocking_peek_if< T > {};
00125 
00126 // get_peek interfaces
00127 
00128 template < typename T >
00129 class tlm_blocking_get_peek_if :
00130   public virtual tlm_blocking_get_if<T> ,
00131   public virtual tlm_blocking_peek_if<T> {};
00132 
00133 template < typename T >
00134 class tlm_nonblocking_get_peek_if :
00135   public virtual tlm_nonblocking_get_if<T> ,
00136   public virtual tlm_nonblocking_peek_if<T> {};
00137 
00138 
00139 template < typename T >
00140 class tlm_get_peek_if :
00141   public virtual tlm_get_if<T> ,
00142   public virtual tlm_peek_if<T> ,
00143   public virtual tlm_blocking_get_peek_if<T> ,
00144   public virtual tlm_nonblocking_get_peek_if<T>
00145   {};
00146 
00147 } // namespace tlm
